Text:
In the Windows XP Professional course from LearnKey, expert instructor Aaron Spurlock uses real-world scenarios to help network administrators learn to install, configure and administer Windows XP Professional. At the conclusion of this course, you will understand the best practices for deploying Windows XP Professional in a Windows 2000 environment and be prepared to pass exam 70-270, which provides core credit for MCP exams.

Benefits

    LearnKey courses meet MCP exam 70-270 objectives.
    Maximize career opportunities with technical credibility.
    Be on your way to MCSA and MCSE Certifications.
